  • Uses of Player in Controller

    Methods in Controller that return Player
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Player
    Controller.whoseNotTurn()
    accessor: Returns the player whose turn is not to play
    Precondition: It is only one of the players' turn to play Postcondition: One of the two players or null has been returned
    Player
    Controller.whoseTurn()
    accessor: Returns the player whose turn is to play or null if it is no one's turn (game has finished)
    Postcondition: One of the two players or null has been returned
    Methods in Controller with parameters of type Player
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    Controller.calculateScoreOfPlayer​(Player p)
    accessor: calculates the score a player and returns it
    Precondition: Player must not be null
    Postcondition: Score of the player has been returned
    String
    Controller.movePlayerToDealerBuyer​(Player p)
    Transformer: The player is moved to the nearest dealer or buyer tile, and the gui is called to move the pawn
    postcondition: The has been moved to the nearest dealer or buyer tile, and the position of the pawn in the gui board has changed accordingly

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Player
    Dice.getOwner()
    accessor: returns the owner of the dice
    Postcondition: The owner has been returned
    Methods in Model with parameters of type Player
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    BankTransactions.bankPaysPlayer​(Player p, int amount)
    transformer: the bank will pay the player an amount of money
    Precondition: The player must not be null and the amount must be a positive number
    Postcondition: The bank has received the money and the amount has been subtracted from the player
    static void
    BankTransactions.playerPaysBank​(Player p, int amount)
    transformer: the player will pay the bank an amount of money
    Precondition: The player must not be null and the amount must be a positive number
    Postcondition: The bank has received the money and the amount has been subtracted from the player
    void
    Jackpot.playerPaysJackpot​(Player p, int amount)
    transformer: the player will pay the jackpot an amount of money
    Precondition: The player must not be null and the amount must be a positive number
    Postcondition: The jackpot has received the money and the amount has been subtracted from the player
    static void
    BankTransactions.playerPaysPlayer​(Player pays, Player payed, int amount)
    transformer: the player will pay the other player an amount of money
    Precondition: The players must not be null and the amount must be a positive number
    Postcondition: The Player has received the money and the amount has been subtracted from the other player
    void
    Dice.setOwner​(Player owner)
    transformer: sets the owner of the dice (can be null if no one owns the dice)
    Postcondition: the owner has changed
    void
    Jackpot.wonJackpot​(Player p)
    transformer: the player that won will receive the current money of the jackpot and the jackpot's money will be set to 0
    Precondition: The player must not be null
    Postcondition: The player has received the money and the jackpot money will be set to zero
    Constructors in Model with parameters of type Player
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    Dice​(Player p)
    constructor: Constructs a new Dice
    postcondition: Creates and initializes a Dice with p as the owner and one as the previous roll (and the imagePath accordingly so that the image is a dice with a 1 roll)
